result.html: Chuaigh siad i mo theanntaThey went along with me.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ siad i mo ṫeanntaThey went along with me.

result.eng: Submit the documents along with the application.
result.ga: Cuir na doiciméid sin isteach i dteannta an iarratais
result.orig: Cuir na doiciméid sin isteach i dteannta an iarratais

result.ponchtml: Cuir na doiciméid sin isteaċ i dteannta an iarrataisSubmit the documents along with the application.

result.eng: My wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.
result.ga: Tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo
result.orig: Tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seo
result.html: Tá mo bhean ag coinneáil go maith an babhta seoMy wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.
result.ponchtml: Tá mo ḃean ag coinneáil go maiṫ an baḃta seoMy wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.

result.eng: I get along well with the other people.
result.ga: Réitím go maith leis na daoine eile
result.orig: Réitím go maith leis na daoine eile
result.html: Réitím go maith leis na daoine eileI get along well with the other people.
result.ponchtml: Réitím go maiṫ leis na daoine eileI get along well with the other people.

result.eng: I don't get along well with the other people.
result.ga: Ní réitím go maith leis na daoine eile
result.orig: Ní réitím go maith leis na daoine eile
result.html: Ní réitím go maith leis na daoine eileI don't get along well with the other people.
result.ponchtml: Ní réitím go maiṫ leis na daoine eileI don't get along well with the other people.

result.eng: Along with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ga: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.orig: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.html: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadhAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ponchtml: Fara aire a ṫaḃairt don leanḃ ḃí uirṫi an teaċ a ġlanaḋAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.

result.eng: She wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ga: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.orig: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.html: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaighShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ponchtml: Níor ligeaḋ di a cuid a iṫe i gcuideaċta an teaġlaiġShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.

result.eng: In 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.
